#### Software

- [1] netanos - Named Entity-based Text ANonymization for Open Science, _M. Mozes_ and **B. Kleinberg**. python + node.js, https://www.npmjs.com/package/netanos, MIT license
- [2] neatStats: Neat and Painless Statistical Reporting, G. Lukács, J. van Doorn, and **B. Kleinberg**. R, https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/neatStats/index.html, BSD-2 license
- [3] Textwash - automated, learning-based text anonymisation, _M. Mozes_ and **B. Kleinberg**. python + R, https://github.com/maximilianmozes/textwash, GPL-3 license
- [4] rgpt3 - Making requests from R to the GPT-3 API, **B. Kleinberg**. R, https://github.com/ben-aaron188/rgpt3, GPL-3 license
